design.overall_style: Modern, sporty, and aerodynamic cycling helmet with a 'Robocop-like' futuristic aesthetic.
design.shape: Streamlined and compact with a slightly extended rear coverage for safety. Features multiple ventilation vents.
design.aesthetic: Sleek matte or glossy finish, often described as looking professional and expensive despite the affordable price.

materials.foam: High-density EPS foam for impact absorption.
materials.padding: Soft, removable, and washable inner padding with insect net.
materials.quality: Sturdy construction, lightweight feel, though some mention plastic components.

key_features.visor: Detachable sun visor (peak) that snaps into the front.
key_features.goggles: Magnetic detachable goggles/eye shield. Strong magnets hold it securely. Fits over most prescription glasses. Tinted (grey) included.
key_features.light: Built-in USB rechargeable LED rear light with 3 modes (steady, flashing, slow flash). Located at the back of the helmet.
key_features.ventilation: Excellent airflow with multiple large vents to keep the head cool.

image_prompt: A high-quality, professional product shot of a modern cycling helmet in matte black with electric blue accents. The helmet features a futuristic design with a magnetic dark-tinted eye shield (goggles) attached to the front. On the back, there is a glowing red LED safety light. The helmet has a streamlined shape with multiple ventilation holes for airflow. It sits on a clean, neutral studio background with soft lighting to highlight the sleek texture and the reflection on the magnetic goggles.
